profile.description:
More than 2 years of experience in web development. Passionate about new technologies and especially the CSS and JavaScript ecosystem.
My purpose, besides, is to be a UI/UX designer; is to generate a clean and scalable code over time that allows its refactoring and optimization. Establishing this way, through libraries and frameworks such as vue.js / react/ laravel. Professional proposals that provide solutions to customers and users

experience.first-job-description: Cell Ripley.cl: landing development. Code refactoring. Maintenance - optimization of versions and technologies. Email development. Implementation of native technologies: html/ css/ vanilla js. Development of cyberday / black fridays / christmas / mothers day.
experience.second-job-description: Web-app development in Laravel and Vuejs, for the automotive branch. Having projects like maserati - autotattersall- inchcape- iberocar. focused on used cars. Development of quotation and appraisal forms. interface interaction. HTML/ CSS/ JS. Within the laravel ecosystem.
experience.last-job-description: HTML/ CSS/ JS development. native environment. For web applications of mygen and taag genetics in their different branches and business approaches. Landing and corporate website. Ui/UX design in figma.
